TextView.android:text: 1) Have you met the life to be assured/proposer?
Please describe the manner in which you gathered information about this case.
2) Have you verified occupation, financial & social position, and personal habits of the Life to be assured as stated in the proposal form & found them to be correct?

3) Do you have any knowledge of Life to be Assured suffering from any serious illness or injury or undergone any operation or medical investigation or aware of having any apparent physical deformity or mental retardation or any other circumstances that are likely to add to the risk?
4) Are you fully satisfied with the overall profile & identity (including KYC details) of the Life to be assured & recommend for policy issuance ?
Clarification for proposal logged by IA in other than Home branch
Does the life assured looks older than what is declared in the proposal?If yes give the approximate age he/she looks like.
